appRoles.description: Allows the app create an on-demand Skype meeting and join guest users into Skype for Business services
Allows the app to join and manage Skype meetings
Allows the app to send and receive instant messages; and manage instant messaging service scenarios
Allows the app to send and receive voice calls; and manage PSTN service scenarios
Allows the app to send and receive audio and video; and manage audio/video service scenarios
Allows the app to create on-demand Skype meetings (short term expiry)

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write Skype user contacts and groups
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read/write Skype user contacts and groups
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and manage your Skype for Business contacts and groups
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and manage your Skype contacts and groups

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to receive instant messages, audio, video, and desktop sharing invitations on-behalf of the signed-in user
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to receive instant messages, audio, video, and desktop sharing invitations

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and update presence, photo, location, note, call forwarding settings of the signed-in user
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and update your presence, photo, location, note, call forwarding settings

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create Skype meetings on-behalf of the signed-in user
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to create Skype meetings

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to initiate instant messages, audio, video, and desktop sharing conversations; and join meetings on-behalf of the signed-in user
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to initiate instant messages, audio, video, and desktop sharing conversations; and join meetings
